wikipedia_page.main: Albert Jenkinson (first ¼ 1884 – death unknown) was an English professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1910s. He played at representative level for  Great Britain, and  England, and at club level for Hunslet, as a wing.

link_mentions.page: List of Great Britain national rugby league team players

response: * Albert Jenkinson won caps for England while at Hunslet in 1911 Australia, in 1912 Wales, in 1913 Wales, and won caps for Great Britain while at Hunslet in 1911–12 Australia (2 matches)
